description: Airing on Tuesday, May 5, 2015: With the April jobs report out this week, we take a look at the labor market. Plus, while the Affordable Care Act is expanding addiction treatment, most programs lack the infrastructure to keep up with the vision laid out by Obamacare. Finally, we talk with Mark Schatzker about his new book, "The Dorito Effect."
